The advertising economy of the internet is making money off of you and we here at Pie believe that you deserve a share.

Streamline your internet experience with Pie Adblock. Block ads, get paid.
long.de:
Ad blockers are great for streamlining your internet experience, but they can also inadvertently block rewards programs or prevent you from accessing coupons and discounts that help you save money as you shop online.

With Pie, you can fully customize your ad experience to ensure you maximize rewards and savings while minimizing unwanted distractions as you shop and browse online. Plus, you can choose to see approved ads and earn rewards just for surfing the web. Download Pie today and enjoy your slice!
